name: Encyclopedia Hunting
description:
A stealth game where you record animals behavior for your encyclopedia. Currently in development. I am planning to finish the game by the end of 2021. Feel free to give feedbacks and opinion on comment bellow.

Control :

ESC - Open Encyclopedia and maps.

Hold right click - Open camera.

Enter - Action button when exclamation point appear above head.

To follow development progress, check out @Hall_ImpGameDev on twitter.

https://twitter.com/Hall_ImpGameDev
